column1: Title: "SGLT2 inhibitor plus DPP-4 inhibitor as combination therapy for type 2 diabetes: A systematic review and meta-analysis"
OUTCOME_HBA1C_ARM1_MD: "SGLT2i+DPP-4i vs SGLT2i: MD -0.35% (95% CI -0.47 to -0.23)"
OUTCOME_WEIGHT_ARM1_MD: "SGLT2i+DPP-4i vs SGLT2i: MD -0.89 kg (95% CI -1.34 to -0.44)"
EXTRACTION_NOTES: "Important evidence for SGLT2i + DPP-4i combination therapy effectiveness"
TITLE: SGLT2 inhibitor plus DPP-4 inhibitor as combination therapy for type 2 diabetes: A systematic review and meta-analysis
